titleStmt.title: A worke of the Beast or A relation of a most vnchristian censure, executed vpon Iohn Lilburne, (novv prisoner in the fleet) the 18 of Aprill 1638 With the heavenly speech vttered by him at the time of his fuffering [sic]. Uery vsefull for these times both for the encouragement of the godly to suffer, and for the terrour and shame of the Lords adversaries.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

titleStmt.title: A worke of the Beast or A relation of a most vnchristian censure, executed vpon Iohn Lilburne, (novv prisoner in the fleet) the 18 of Aprill 1638 With the heavenly speech vttered by him at the time of his fuffering [sic]. Uery vsefull for these times both for the encouragement of the godly to suffer, and for the terrour and shame of the Lords adversaries.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare the Beast was wounded 1638.

notesStmt.note: Identification of printer and place of publication from STC.
WIth a final leaf of verse.
